experience.title: Simply Business
experience.subtitle: Senior Full-stack Software Engineer
descriptions: Automated the deploy process for an AWS CloudSearch database using Jenkins and the AWS Ruby SDK. This replaced a painfully manual engineering process and improved both delivery time and developer experience.
Built the company's first integration with third party insurers' RESTful APIs. This involved large internal changes to a legacy monolithic application architecture to support this new capability.
Managed large-scale migrations of years worth of data on our production MongoDB instance.
Presented at tech-wide meetings on debugging local Docker environments, Git best practices, and application security with RailsGoat.

experience.title: Turo
experience.subtitle: Senior Back-end Software Engineer
descriptions: Built one of the company's first microservices. This involved Dockerizing and migrating our currency exchange service from our monolithic application and deploying it in Kubernetes. It established several patterns that later Microservices followed.

Replaced a third party payment processing service. This high-risk 'payments exorcism' involved refactoring thousands of lines of code and extremely careful testing, as it touched all of the most central parts of the product.
Designed and implemented a Spring-component architecture pattern to handle data downloading to comply with General Data Protection Regulations (GDPR).
Developed and augmented RESTful APIs and SQL data models that improved overall customer experience.
